description:
### ColumnTitle

The program converts a given number into a title comprised of alphabets where 1 corresponds to 'A', 26 to 'Z', 27 to 'AA' and so on similar to the Excel column titles. The input number is in the range of [1, 1,000,000,000].

Input: Single integer number.
Output: String representing the title.

Example:

``` columnTitle(27) // AA ```
